TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListItemCollection extends System.Windows.Documents.TextElementCollection`1<class System.Windows.Documents.ListItem>

Docs.summary: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.ListItem"> elements. ListItemCollection defines the allowable child content of a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.List> element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ListItemCollection creation is only permitted inside a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.List> object. As such, a ListItemCollection cannot be instantiated directly and has no default or overloaded constructor.

Docs.summary: Gets the first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.ListItem"> element within this instance of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.ListItemCollection>.
Docs.value: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.ListItem"> element within this instance of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.ListItemCollection>.

Docs.summary: Gets the last <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.ListItem"> element within this instance of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.ListItemCollection>.
Docs.value: The last <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.ListItem"> element within this instance of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.ListItemCollection>.
